page.title: 01DOBWALLS AND TREVELMOND.
page.content: DOBWALLS AND TREVELMOND ARE THE MAIN AREAS OF SETTLEMENT IN A BLOCK THAT LIES BENEATH THE BODMIN MOOR AND BETWEEN LISKEARD AND THE GLYNN VALLEY. THE REST OF THE AREA IS SPARSELY POPULATED. THE AREA IS SERVED BY THE A38(T) AND THE PENZANCE TO PADDINGTON RAILWAY LINE WITH A STATION AT LISKEARD. MOST OF THE OTHER ROADS ARE MINOR. PEOPLE LIVING IN THIS BLOCK DO A VARIETY OF JOBS. AGRICULTURE IS THE TRADITIONAL WORK OF THE AREA BUT WITH CHANGES ON THE LAND HAVE COME CHANGES IN THE WAY OF LIFE. THIS BLOCK IS NOT WELL SUPPLIED WITH AMENITIES. RURAL AREAS HAVE ALWAYS HAD TO BE SELF-SUFFICIENT.HOWEVER THE AREA IS CHANGING RAPIDLY AS ARE ITS NEEDS, MAKING THIS AN INTERESTING PLACE IN WHICH TO LIVE.
